title: Basics of Television Production: Strengthening Practical Skills Through Active and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners participate in field-intensive projects using personal devices, with opportunities for collaborative learning with industry experts

learning_goals: Learners can write TV program proposals in groups of four and submit revised versions incorporating peer feedback
Learners can produce and edit 10-minute short-form video content using at least three types of real-time streaming equipment
Learners can diagnose technical issues occurring during production through team collaboration and propose solutions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
